lead_paragraph: With concealed weapons now legal in all 50 states, the National Rifle Association's focus at this week's annual meeting is less about enacting additional state protections than on making sure the permits already issued still apply when the gun owners travel across the country.

headline.main: NRA Seeks Universal Gun Law at National Meeting
headline.print_headline: NRA Seeks Universal Gun Law at National Meeting
